div.p: Toast to the knights that left our voices sore
Arm in arm with mischief in our eyes
Every Song a bond,
our spirits high Stomping feet, we own this fight
Hearts ablaze, wir unite every sound
Journey on from dusk till dawn
We're bound
Raise your pints up, friends of mine
Yeah, flo, you're always by my side
We're not gonna afraid, not one small doubt
Every tale's a crack with you about
We're gonna shred some strings, stage a light
Screaming anthems through the night We are now
Now we march to the beat of our drum
Thrashing harder, come what may come
We're the kings of this emerald town
With every uproar, we claim the crown
Leaning in as the crowd roars loud Flo und I in this raucous crowd
Through the tavern doors, our legend grows
Stout hearts entwine like Celtic knots, who knows?
Every shanty, every cheer we compose Flo, you're the maid who always toast
Through the tavern doors, our legend grows Stout hearts entwine like Celtic knots, who knows?
Every shanty, every cheer wir compose Flo, you're the maid who always toast
